overview: Aerosmith at Cidade do Rock, Rio de Janeiro, Brazil on September 21, 2017. Setlist: Let the Music Do the Talking / Love in an Elevator / Cryin' / Livin' on the Edge / Rag Doll / Falling in Love (Is Hard on the Knees) / Stop Messin' Around (Fleetwood Mac cover) (Joe Perry on vocals) / Oh Well (Fleetwood Mac cover) / Crazy / I Don't Want to Miss a Thing / Eat the Rich / Come Together (The Beatles cover) / Sweet Emotion / Dude (Looks Like a Lady) / Dream On / Walk This Way
title: Aerosmith: Rock in Rio 2017
